name: NBCNews
text: Analysis: President Trump is reluctantly accepting that the politics of coronavirus are tightly tied to the threats it poses to his fellow Americans. https://t.co/q42jWXyMn7

name: NBCNews
text: Preliminary data shows reports of child abuse around the US have plunged during the pandemic. Experts fear the amount of abuse has actually risen. https://t.co/srApGhx3UF

name: NBCNews
text:
It was the deadliest human trafficking tragedy in the U.S. in at least a decade. 

Now, some of the survivors feel the threat of coronavirus. https://t.co/Y4bjQ3yqtf

name: NBCNews
text: Nigerian refugee creates New York City's first full-time shelter for asylum-seekers. https://t.co/TUNCCEixBV

name: NBCNews
text:
Election experts warn that Americans may not know who won the presidency or the Senate on Election Night.

A surge of mail-in votes and rules about how they're counted in key states like Pennsylvania and Michigan could delay results for days. https://t.co/RNvne7ov2n
